# Candidate Model Fitting

\begin{algorithm}[H]
  \SetAlgoLined
  \SetKw{hihc}{$N$}
  \SetKw{model}{$M$}
  \SetKw{outcomes}{$\boldsymbol{Y}$}
  \SetKw{numreps}{$R$}
  \SetKw{priorprd}{$k$}
  \SetKw{sampseas}{$s$}

  \hihc{: Hypothetical hospitalization curve distribution}
  \BlankLine

  \model{: Candidate models }
  \BlankLine

  \priorprd{$\in$ \{2, 3, 4, 5\}}
  \BlankLine

  \numreps{: Number of replications}
  \BlankLine

  \outcomes{ $\in$ \{peak hospitalizations, peak week, cumulative hospitalizations\} }
  \BlankLine\BlankLine

  \ForEach {\model}{
    \For {$i = 1$ to \numreps}{
      Sample \priorprd seasons from \hihc with replacement to form $\priorprd_{set}(i)$\;
      Concatenate $\priorprd_{set}(i)$ in sampled order\;
      Fit \model to $\priorprd_{set}(i)$ using stepwise selection\;
      \BlankLine

      Sample \sampseas\;
      Predict $\hat{Y}_s$ using \model\;
      \BlankLine

      Calculate root mean squared error and relative bias.
    }
  }

\end{algorithm}
